name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's research facility on Punk Hazard, where he conducts illegal experiments including the SAD production and human gigantification research.

keyEvents.title: Vergo Confronts Law in the Laboratory
keyEvents.description: Vergo appears in the laboratory corridors and confronts Law, revealing their past connection.
keyEvents.significance: The laboratory becomes the setting for the revelation of Vergo's identity and his defeat of Law.

keyEvents.title: Law vs Vergo Battle
keyEvents.description: Law and Vergo fight in the laboratory, with Vergo quickly overpowering Law.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the danger within the laboratory and the threats beyond just Caesar.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational under Caesar's control

description: A former government research facility island in the New World, split between fire and ice after a devastating chemical explosion. Now serves as Caesar Clown's base for illegal experiments.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Caesar Battle
keyEvents.description: The exterior of the laboratory becomes a battlefield as Luffy confronts Caesar.
keyEvents.significance: Major confrontation location showcasing the island's dangerous environment.

keyEvents.title: Smiley Threatens the Island
keyEvents.description: Smiley, capable of recreating the chemical explosion that devastated Punk Hazard four years ago, is seen by the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: References the island's tragic past and threatens to repeat it.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Rescue in Poisonous Lake
keyEvents.description: Sanji dives into one of Punk Hazard's poisonous lakes to rescue Kin'emon's torso.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the hazardous nature of Punk Hazard's environment.

statusHistory.reason: Island was abandoned after a chemical explosion four years before the current timeline
Caesar Clown has taken over the island for his experiments
